name: Fast Attack Craft
description:
Fast Attack Craft

Version: 2019 RC1

In the far future pseudo-humans called Hegemony of Axruxians challenge Consortium of Colonies  at the Coalsack region. The player is tasked to lead a task force of Consortium navy.

The game is turn based tactical strategy for one or two players.
Players can challenge each other in hotseat type of elimination or space station defence.

Design and Coding: Rami Sihvo

Music: With permission of StringStorm 
(Etheral Wandering, Slave to System, Mobilize, Iron Moon, Infectious, Mutation Madante, Ebb)

Produced with GameMaker Studio 2

Loosely based on Miska Fredman's 'Heimot' and 'Warhogs' RPG"

Addotonal graphics from opengameart.org:

Asteroid details by NASA (General permission)
Scifi UI Panel by Bart (CC BY-SA 3.0)
Scaurian Space Ship Bridge by Tuomo Untinen (CC0)
Space Stations by MillionthVector
Spaceships & Fighters by Skorpio (CC BY-SA 3.0)
Portraits by Justin Nichol (CC BY-SA 3.0)
Space Backdrop by beren77 (CC0)
Space graphics by Cuzco (CC0)
Nebula & planet graphics by Viktor Hahn  (CC BY-SA 4.0)
